name: Cybel
storyline:
You play as Cybel, a girl who will climb the floors of a heavily defended industrial tower to find revenge.
To be up to the task, Cybel will find supernatural powers in a pact with 3 mysterious witches.
The pact is simple : in exchange for immense powers, Cybel have to destroy the tower and kill everything in it.
Her memories of the pact are vague but her thirst for revenge is crystal clear. Quenching her burning desire for vengeance is her one and only goal.

KILL THEM!.. KILL THEM ALL!.. DESTROY THE TOWER!
summary: Cybel is a frantic top-down shooter set in a unique occult science-fiction universe. You play as Cybel, a girl who will climb the floors of a heavily defended industrial tower to find revenge.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Cybel - An Elevator Witch Goes on a Killing Rampage in this Hotline Miami-esque Dark Sci-Fi Shooter!
